page.title: 03THE TANNERY
page.content: The Tannery was built about 105 years ago,which means it was built about 1880.There have been huge changes all over the factory and major developments.Before this the Tannery was a shoe factory. About 120 people are employed there. There are about 30 different stages to go through before the skin is ready to leave the factory.It depends on what condition the leather is in to how long the whole job of cleaning up the leather takes. When they reach the factory the skins are : sorted,preserved,sorted into grades, de_greased,tanned,wet wheeled,fat liquored,dried and dry wheeled.They are then sent to Rushden where they are made into shoes.
